showerReviews.reviewText: They got Starbucks next door food was great shower are hot pumps are pumping

The showers have been unavailable forever here. And the employees laugh at truckers for not being able to take a shower. Strange they don‚Äôt appreciate their own customer base and treat us truckers with respect. We work hard and stay out on ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Went for the shower but the showers are so nasty plus too much stinky. ‚Ä¶

For HALF size shower you should charge half price! 25$ for a shower is a joke! Shower was so small I could not rotate without touching my body to walls. AVOID this one. There is loves next to it, go there.
Don't come here if you're wanting a shower

Had a very nice shower. Then I had problems at the cashier. The overcharged me and then took over 15 minutes and 3 cashiers later just to give me my money back. Spoke with the manager she was very nice and pleasant and explain the situation ‚Ä¶

In the shower toilet & floor hadn't been cleaned in awhile. Receipt from previous person on the floor next to a lot of hair from previous people. I'm very appreciative of the people who clean the showers at truck stops but this was long- ‚Ä¶
The showers are to small and extremely hot very uncomfortable no ventilation at all so make sure u shower with cold water ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è9/04/24 ‚Ä¶

very dirt showers and laundry machines . these dirty machines are even not working properly . i had dirty  clothes. i washed twice but still clothes were dirty ,wastage of money and time .Bad smell  in the shower and toilet was so dirty ü§Æ. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stumbled upon it late and had many spots open. You can use Pilot card here. The shower comes with a free golf cart ride across the parking lot to another building. Hold on tight my man takes off quick. No towels, but I use my own anyway. A ‚Ä¶

Women's rest room is "out of order" despite the cashier coming out of it as I came in. Showers all have signs saying use shower only, so apparently you can't use a toilet even if you pay for a shower. According to reviews from a year ago, ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Best truck stop I‚Äôve ever been too, out does all the name brand truck stops, not only do they have amazing showers hot water! Clean bathrooms! Easy access to laundry only takes coins, but they have good food inside, they sell beer, easy in ‚Ä¶
Very clean showers with towel and washcloth provided. Was able to shower and wash our car sick toddler, fuel up, snack up, and return to the road with all smiles. Thank you!!!

I showered here a dozen times and tipped the cleaning people everytime until one day I was denied after driving all the way over here. Apparently the showers are only for "commercial" drivers. Yet every employee has sold me a shower except ‚Ä¶

I like the place. Lots of parking. Be prepared though if you want a shower they hold your license until you bring the key back. It just weirded me out someone having my cdl. Shower was modern and very clean. Good water pressure.
Shower was actually really clean üëç was happy about that. Also it‚Äôs $17.00 for a shower. ‚Ä¶

My favorite place to stop along the 5!   Has everything you need, showers are clean ( cashiers hold your license and return it to u when u give them the shower key back).  Dickeys BBQ, Carls Jr in walking distance.   The pre-made sandwiches ‚Ä¶

This place is really bad. I went and took a shower in shower 8 and it's really bad everything is!! dirty !! And the lady that cleans the showers is not a good person I talked to her about the shower and she said yes!! what ever !! I don't ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a pretty decent truck stop has lots of parking, laundry, trucker lounge and showers there‚Äôs a truck was next door Dennys and a Dickeys BBQ. Great place to stop and do your 30 min break or 10 hr rest I‚Äôm giving it a 2 star only because ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ out on the road. Not only Gas station but the Store has Awesome variety and selections.....everything you are needing will almost always be here. Also have shower rooms if you need that too. Plus have a Dennys connected right next door.
Clean very helpful staff, good place to park a lot larger parking area then I thought for semi‚Äôs. Next time I plan on using the shower. I‚Äôll give another update on that one as well.
